Residential Property Management          Certificate in Sustainable Design, Construction, and Development                                  Ready to Proceed?           Register Now        Request Information        Events                                                                  The NYU School of Professional Studies Schack Institute of Real Estate offers more than 500 noncredit courses , certificate programs , and intensive programs annually to keep professionals abreast of the latest trends affecting the industry, as well as comprehensive programs for those with no real estate background who are interested in entering these rapidly evolving fields.           Ready to Proceed?        Register for Courses Now                 Noncredit Courses        Noncredit courses in real estate, architecture, engineering, and construction are designed to help you stay abreast of emerging trends and best practices, to gain the skills necessary to begin working in these industries, or to fulfill New York State continuing education requirements. Those new to these fields can prepare for the salesperson's or architect's licensing examinations. Other courses cover finance, development, construction management, facility and property management, and more.            A Selection of Courses From This Department                                              Applied Real Estate Finance and Investment                                                            The Business of Real Estate: Finance and Investment                                                            New York Real Estate Salesperson's Course                                                            Real Estate Development                                                            Real Estate Investment Decision Analysis                                                            Schematic Design for the A.R.E.                                                                               View all Schack Institute of Real Estate Noncredit Courses           Certificates        Online and in-person certificate programs help you to pursue specializations within your field, gain heightened expertise in an emerging area, and boost your career. Certificate programs, ranging from Real Estate Finance and Investment and Commercial Property Management to Construction Project Management and Computer-Aided Design Using AutoCAD , are specially designed to fit into your busy schedule, while providing you with the comprehensive knowledge and the insights required to excel in your area of interest.
